author: Rosie McCall
title: New York Hospitals Are Using Vitamin C to Treat Some Coronavirus Patients
description: "Taking large doses of vitamin C tablets would be very unlikely to protect you from COVID-19—unless you were actually vitamin C deficient," Prof. Peter McCaffery told Newsweek.
content:
Large doses of vitamin C are being administered to patients in intensive care at certain hospitals in New York, Newsweek has confirmed with a spokesperson for Northwell Health.
They confirmed reports that patients testing positive with COVID-19 were in some … [+5707 chars]
